answers.answer: Hello.Have you ruled out diabetes? Diabetic neuropathy can manifest in such symptoms. Other issue to be considered is your work.Do you have any long standing back problem?Regards

question: There are numbness in my hands.  They have gotten worse over the years.  They are mild but if I hold my hands on the wheels for too long, or write for too long, the numbness gets worse.  And if I let them down and relax for a while, they get better.  Sometimes, there are burning sensation in the palms of my hands.  I have no idea what this is.  I have visited a few doctors but there are no definitive treatments that make it better.  The amount of numbness seems to be getting worse and moving upward through the arms.Your answers and suggestions are appreciated.
title: Numbness in hands and arms
